summary: Build an aesthetic 5-page website for KUTS & KOLOR Luxury Unisex Salon (Mumbai Central) including business info, services, and contact details.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Luxury salon hero background with warm neutral tones and subtle premium ambiance (salon-hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Minimal line icon set as a single sprite/strip for Hair, Skin, Nails in a consistent style (service-icons-strip.dim_1200x300.png)
- Gallery placeholder image 1: premium salon interior scene, neutral tones (gallery-01.dim_1200x900.png)
- Gallery placeholder image 2: hair coloring tools flat-lay, premium aesthetic (gallery-02.dim_1200x900.png)
- Gallery placeholder image 3: manicure/nail care close-up, clean minimal style (gallery-03.dim_1200x900.png)
- Gallery placeholder image 4: skincare/spa setup, calm luxury look (gallery-04.dim_1200x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a 5-page marketing website for “KUTS & KOLOR Luxury Unisex Salon” with top-level navigation and routes for: Home, About, Services, Gallery, and Contact.

Apply a single, coherent visual theme suitable for a luxury unisex salon (colors, typography, spacing, imagery style) and enforce it consistently across all pages. Do not use a blue/purple default palette.

Home page content must prominently present: salon name, a short tagline/value proposition derived from the provided description, key service categories (hair, skin, nails; plus emphasis on hair treatment and hair colour), and a clear call-to-action to contact/call and/or book via dingg.app (as an external link).

About page must include the provided salon description text (edited only for grammar/clarity while preserving meaning) and key facts: location area (Mumbai Central, Navjivan Society), and “Areas served: India”.

Services page must present salon services grouped into clear sections for Hair, Skin, and Nails, including a highlighted section for Hair Treatments and Hair Colour, with tasteful UI (cards/list with brief descriptions).
Gallery page must display a responsive image grid (with lightbox or modal preview) using generated placeholder salon imagery (until real photos are provided).

Contact page must display the full address, phone number (click-to-call), hours (“Open · Closes 9 pm”), and location context (“Navjivan Commercial Premises CHS”, “Mumbai Central”). Include an external link for booking/services to dingg.app.
Add shared layout components (header/nav and footer) including consistent branding and key contact info (phone + area/location) across all pages.

Create and integrate required static images as generated assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, and use them consistently (hero image, gallery placeholders, and simple service category visuals).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an aesthetic 5-page salon website for KUTS & KOLOR Luxury Unisex Salon using provided business details (location, hours, phone, services).

projectName: KUTS & KOLOR Luxury Unisex Salon Website
